says_what: As a Korean trip planner, write one very short message to use at the beginning of the conversation in English
Welcome to South Korea! Let's plan an unforgettable trip together. 🇰🇷✈️
I want to travel to seoul, and I want to try local food and the karting as well

Day 1:
  • 기찻길고기골목 (Railroad Track BBQ Alley) in Seoul
  • 남대문시장갈치조림골목 (Namdaemun Market Grilled Cutlassfish Alley) in Seoul
  • 홍대피카소거리 (Hongdae Picasso Street) - Enjoy karting! in Seoul
Enjoy your food adventures and thrilling karting experience in Seoul! 🏎️🍲
I want to travel for one week

Day 1:
  • 기찻길고기골목 (Railroad Track BBQ Alley) in Seoul
  • 남대문시장갈치조림골목 (Namdaemun Market Grilled Cutlassfish Alley) in Seoul
  • 홍대피카소거리 (Hongdae Picasso Street) - Enjoy karting! in Seoul
Day 2:
  • 홍대피카소거리 (Hongdae Picasso Street) - Enjoy karting! in Seoul
  • 삼청동거리 (Samcheong-dong Street) - Explore traditional and modern Seoul in Seoul
  • 북창동먹자골목 (Bukchang-dong Food Alley) in Seoul
Day 3:
  • 서울숲은행나무길 (Seoul Forest Ginkgo Tree Road) in Seoul
  • 청계천 (Cheonggyecheon Stream) - A peaceful urban oasis in Seoul
  • 명동거리 (Myeongdong Street) - Shopping and street food galore in Seoul
Day 4:
  • 전포카페거리 (Jeonpo Cafe Street) in Busan
  • 용리단길 (Yongri-dan Street) - Experience the charm of Busan in Busan
  • 광안리해수욕장 (Gwangalli Beach) - Relax by the beautiful beach in Busan
Day 5:
  • 오이도포구해양관광단지 (Oido Maritime Tourism Complex) in Siheung
  • 오이도포장마차촌 (Oido Food Truck Village) in Siheung
  • 일산애니골까페촌 (Ilsan Anime Alley) - A quirky and fun experience in Goyang
Day 6:
  • 수원남문시장푸드트레일러 (Suwon Namun Market Food Trailer Street) in Suwon
  • 의정부떡볶이골목 (Uijeongbu Spicy Rice Cake Alley) in Uijeongbu
  • 의정부부대찌개거리 (Uijeongbu Army Stew Alley) in Uijeongbu
Day 7:
  • 안산곱창골목 (Ansan Intestine Alley) in Ansan
  • 화서역먹거리촌 (Hwaseo Station Food Village) in Suwon
  • 방배역먹자골목 (Bangbae Station Food Alley) in Seoul
Enjoy your week-long adventure in South Korea filled with delicious food, thrilling adventures, and unforgettable experiences! 🇰🇷🍽️🎢
